titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University Laboratory Equipment collection, ca. 1920s-2000s UA 384
titlestmt.author: Chad Fisher

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 13:37:10 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

physdesc.extent: 120 Linear Feet
120 items

did.abstract: This collection contains decommissioned laboratory equipment from a variety of academic departments on the Rice University campus.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Over the years, the Woodson Research Center has saved decommissioned laboratory equipment from across campus.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains decommissioned laboratory equipment from a variety of academic departments on the Rice University campus. Each item has been numbered and is physically described.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research. Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Additional materials are expected for this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University Laboratory Equipment collection, 1920s-2000s, UA 384, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.
